title: How much is the 5G network speed? - Quora

response.answer_text: 5G speeds will range from ~50 Mbit/s to over a gigabit/s. The 5G network is distinguished by its massive capacity and ultra low latency. Applications that rely on near real-time completion and virtually imperceptible lag times. If you want to learn more about 5G technology you can check out Niwisha Info Solutions. Niwisha Info Solutions is one of the R&D organizations of the wireless protocol domain. Niwisha Info Solutions was established with the intent of delivering quality training in the area of Wireless protocol stack testing & development.
5G is very much network in which you can download 2 Gb movie in just 5 minutes as compared to general speed of sims. It is used in US UK Only soon it will be implemented in India .
